tool.name: CreateNetworkConnectivityFileNHDPlus

param.name: in_drainage_line_features
param.dialogReference: These are the Drainage Line features that contain the COMID, FROMNODE, TONODE, and DIVERGENCE fields.

param.name: stream_ID
param.dialogReference: This is the unique ID associates with the stream reach. For the NHDPlus it is usually COMID.

param.name: fromnode_field
param.dialogReference: This is the FROMNODE field in the NHDPlus attributes. This may need to be added from the extended attribute tables.

param.name: tonode_field
param.dialogReference: This is the TONODE field in the NHDPlus attributes. This may need to be added from the extended attribute tables.

param.name: divergence_field
param.dialogReference: This is the DIVERGENCE field in the NHDPlus attributes. This may need to be added from the extended attribute tables.

param.name: out_network_connectivity_file
param.dialogReference: This is where the connectivity file will be output to.

param.name: max_nbr_upstreams
param.dialogReference: This is the limit for the maximum number of upstream reaches for any given stream.

tool.summary: Creates the stream network connectivity file as the input to RAPID from the drainage line feature class. For more information about this file, go to rapid-hub.org.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Creates the stream network connectivity file as the input to RAPID from the drainage line feature class. For more information about this file, go to rapid-hub.org.
